p:
GPx was analyzed by the following method briefly. The supernatant (200 μL) was added to a mixture of 1 mL of 0.4 M phosphate buffer (pH 7.0), 1 mL of 5 mM NaN 3, and 1 mL of 4 mM glutathione. The mixture was preincubated for 5 min at 37 °C. Then, 1 mL of 4 mM hydrogen peroxide was added and further incubated for 5 min. The amount of excess GSH was measured by the reported method.
51 The results were expressed as μmol/mg of the protein.
